enabled.description: Enable or disable the Olympic Medal Count plugin.

view_mode.description: Display mode: 'top5' cycles through the top 5 countries, 'usa_only' shows only USA medal counts.

cycle_interval.description: Seconds to display each country before cycling to the next (Top 5 mode only).

header_scroll_speed.description: Speed of the header text scroll in pixels per frame.

target_fps.description: Target frames per second for display rendering.

update_interval.description: How often (in seconds) to fetch fresh data from the API.

cache_ttl.description: Cache time-to-live in seconds for API responses.

top_n_countries.description: Number of top countries to display in Top N mode.
